synopsis.text: Award-winning chaos unfolds as a martial arts-obsessed mantis wreaks havoc in a world shared with unsuspecting humans. With a penchant for can-kicking and cicada-hunting, this relentless insect's antics form the crux of Shintaro Kishimoto's personal masterpiece. As a trusted ally of Production I.G's 3D team, Kishimoto's creation clinched the esteemed Ofuji Award in 2005, promising viewers an unforgettable blend of action and intrigue.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
